title: Discogs Music Database
subtitle: Auto‑updating monthly snapshot of Discogs in dual‑format DuckDB & SQLite databases
description:
This dataset is an auto‑maintained monthly snapshot of the Discogs public data dump, continuously refreshed by the cron‑driven ETL pipeline (`discogs_etl.ipynb`). It provides data in two query‑ready formats: DuckDB (analytics‑optimized, parallel OLAP) and SQLite (fully previewable in Kaggle UI).

Tables include: artists, labels, releases, masters.

Use DuckDB for large aggregations; use SQLite for quick schema and metadata preview.

resources.description: Discogs data stored as a DuckDB database for high‑performance analytics.
Same dataset in SQLite format for full preview support in Kaggle's UI.
Cron‑ready notebook that downloads, transforms, and versions the monthly Discogs dump.
